QuestData.Title: Brotherly Love
QuestData.Description: He must be put out of his misery, soldier! He knows not what he does. He has become a mindless servant of the dreaded Banshee Queen.$B$BVenture forth, across the Field of Strife, to the depths of Frostwolf territory. Find my brother and destroy him. His torment must come to an end.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel into Frostwolf territory and slay Commander Louis Philips. Return to Commander Karl Philips when the task is complete.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is with heavy heart that I give such an order, soldier.
QuestData.RewardText: You did remember to burn the corpse, didn't you?
